alert.note: Alert for St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 13 at 2:27PM CDT until May 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL ST. LOUIS COUNTY... At 227 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bridgeton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 220 PM CDT, golf ball size hail was reported near Bridgeton. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Florissant, Maryland Heights, Hazelwood, Creve Coeur, Overland, St. Ann, Bridgeton, Berkeley, Ladue, Olivette, St. John, Woodson Terrace, Lambert-St. Louis International Airport, Breckenridge Hills, Edmundson, and Champ. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri near exit 231. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
